subject: Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Tyson Gay has pulled out of Friday’s 100-meter showdown with Usain Bolt and Asafa Powell at the Golden League meet in Brussels. Gay, who has been dogged by hamstring troubles since the United States Olympic trials, said he withdrew because he did not want to risk further damage.
